snippet: Stephen Curry’s missed 3-point attempt with 5.3 seconds left sealed Golden State’s first regular-season loss at Oracle Arena since January 2015. The Warriors fell to 68-8 this season.
lead_paragraph: Stephen Curry’s missed 3-point attempt with 5.3 seconds left sealed Golden State’s first regular-season loss at Oracle Arena since January 2015. The Warriors fell to 68-8 this season.

headline.print_headline: Celtics End Warriors’ 54-Game Home Winning Streak
headline.main: Celtics End Warriors’ 54-Game Home Winning Streak
